feedback_data.text: The office is too noisy and the air conditioning is always too cold, making it difficult to concentrate.
My manager provides clear guidance and regular constructive feedback. I feel supported in my role.
The salary is below market rate and the bonus structure is unclear. We need better compensation transparency.
The flexible working hours have helped me maintain a better work-life balance. Great policy!
There are limited opportunities for advancement within my department. Need better career paths.
